Counter-Strike is still by far the best game to play, this game can be played for hours and hours, i personally love the Bots , and playing them with my friends. The New GO just needs to release the Original Maps Remastered !! This Game Never get old. We are still supporting it after ALL these years, and years to come , and with New Generations to come. Keep up the good work ,  and if can put back the Bots future on 1.6 , like it used to come with at one point, and if Condition Zero doesnt have it , please add to it aswell. I stopped Playing Battefield games, ever since part 3 said it was going to have Bots, and it never came out with them, and all their future releases same no Bots, so i stopped supporting them with my friends because of that. Thank you Valve for Everything , I cant wait for Half-Life 3

CS:GO was one of the first games I played on PC and still play to this day. The game has always intrigued me from its competitive play to its community servers. If you get bored with one mode you can always play a different one so I would play hours at a time. I enjoy this game dearly and would recommend it. So go and enjoy it!

Os 10 passos de qualquer iniciante em CS:GO
1) Instalar
2) Abrir o jogo
3) Procurar uma partida
4) Entrar na partida
5) Começar a morrer milhares de vezes (Porque esse match making é tão bom q joga um iniciante contra um time inimigo de no mínimo 2 pro players, que já devem ter 500 horas de jogo)
6) Ser xingado de tudo e qualquer coisa
7) Seu time inicia votação para te kickar
8) Você é kickado da sala
9) Fechar o jogo
10) Desinstalar 
AVISO: Se os passos 9 e 10 não forem seguidos, o jogador irá experiênciar a repetição dos passos de 3 Até 8.
Ótimo jogo Valve :)
